The prophet here describes a people who, in a time of general departure from truth and righteousness, are seeking 
                                                                           678
to restore the principles that are the foundation of the kingdom of God. They are repairers of a breach that has been made in God's law--the wall that He has placed around His chosen ones for their protection, and obedience to whose precepts of justice, truth, and purity is to be their perpetual safeguard.
